message: Where am I? How did I get here?
I remember feeling something similar to Scrap...
From somewhere in the distance, I hear a clear and gentle melody.
But I can't tell the ceiling from the floor.
I'm floating in some strange space.
From time to time, the melody distorts. Sparks flash in the empty space.
Their heat scorches my skin. I smell them burning.
Through it all, the melody persists.
